body:
Streamix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV programmes, films, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one free. There's always something new to discover, and new TV programmes and films are added every week!
Watch Streamix on your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, laptop or streaming device, all for free.

Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your Streamix account to watch instantly on the web from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Streamix , including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.

 Take Streamix with you anywhere.

Streamix is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account at any time.

header: What can I watch on Streamix?
body: Streamix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV programmes, anime, gaming, and more. Watch as much as you want, any time you want.
